note.p: Daughter of John and Mary Brocklehurst of Macclesfield, Cheshire. Married John Coucher Dent in 1847. With her husband, restored Sudeley Castle, Winchcombe, Gloucestershire.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/1792/75/9)

p.hi: General Register Office: registers of births, marriages and deaths surrendered to the non-parochial registers commissions of 1837 and 1857 (TNA RG4/2904, Ancestry.com, accessed 29 September 2022)
